item.title: RPDC 264: Firing on All Cylinders
item.description:
Spool up that twin turbo and drop the clutch, we're reading things on the internet!

We've got them nitro-blasted internet reviews for the lovely la gon ma, smelling salts and their various techniques, confidence and male hair sculpting putty, Alien (1979), and becoming an enlightened bald with a head razor. For the segment, we say Thanks, Abby with some readings of Dear, Abby. Vrooms and zooms, people!


Want more party? Check it out at https://www... Feed: https://anchor.fm/s/2a1ed7d0/podcast/rss

item.title: Politics on Trial 100th Anniversary Special: Franz Kafka’s The Trial
item.description: Today’s episode in Politics on Trial is about the most famous trial in literature and one that never actually takes place. David talks to writer and literary scholar Ian Ellison about Franz Kafka’s The Trial, first published in 1925... Feed: https://feeds.megaphone.fm/ARML2708405200
